title: How do authors and illustrators work together? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m an author who has never worked with an illustrator, but I would imagine that, as with all creative partnerships, there are many different patterns. Discuss first? Author writes text and illustrator does the rest (with or without imput from the author). Author writes text to accompany a series of illustrations. The “right way” would be whatever works for the two people involved.
